ComicInfo.Title: Stranger in a Strange Land; How to Fart and Get Away With it...; I know what I can do! I'll become a squirrel and go live in the park!"; Cuckolds; Stinkball; Fooh Fooh; Amazons: Episode Two; Merdeley in Angouleme!; Sqat Romance; A Bit of History; Lucien Helps Out; Crime and/or Punishment
